column1: storyFromEarth::The player is alone with McGyver in is ship so it doesn't know how to navigate well. \nhe was arrested by the coast guard of the planet and taken prisoner. \nafter 3 days
column2: he was brought before the king of Zounkla and asked to told his story.

column1: choice1_0::hide it to the king but he has a mind reader so he know
choice1_story::"Look what you did dude !" said McGyver
column3: we are lost in a fucking dungeon in god know which fucking planet". \nThey started to fight. \nSuddenly
column4: the hero stops and tells his sidekick to shut up and listen
column5: there was someone coming. The princess of the planet enter the room and tell "I heard you spoke to my father. I always wanted to find the fountains of youth
column6: if you take me with you I'll help you escape and I'll provide food for the crew as you do not seems to eat very well".

column1: storyFromAstronomiya::With the help of their navigator
column2: the heroes were able to enter the planet without being spotted by the coast guard. The navigator advised them to go to a well known black market on this planet where they could find food.

column1: choice3_1::don't go to the black market
choice3_1_story::don't find someone to provide food
choice4_1_story::don't have anyone to provide food
choice4_0_story::now have a new crew member that can provide food get out of the planet
